description:
Yes, we support different Latin language for text and caption. Ping us to know the availability of your preferred language at support@picovico.com

*Some languages are supported only in a few styles.
description_text: Yes, we support different Latin language for text and caption. Ping us to know the availability of your preferred language at support@picovico.com *Some languages are supported only in a few styles.
title: Can I use language other than English?
